Package project2

Class Resident

java.lang.Object
project2.Student
project2.Resident
public class Resident
extends Student
The Resident sub class is where we create a student of type Resident. Tuition is calculated based on Resident pricing. Aid is also calculated and applied in this class.
Author:
Manav Bali, Daniel Lopez

  • Method Details

    • giveAid

      public String giveAid​(double amount)
      Applies student's aid to their tuition. Aid can't be over tuition total.
      Overrides:
      giveAid in class Student
      Parameters:
      amount - of aid.
      Returns:
      applied if aid applied to tuition, error statement otherwise.

    • tuitionDue

      public void tuitionDue()
      Calculates tuition based on if student is part time or full time. Credits are also used to find tuition.
      Overrides:
      tuitionDue in class Student
